      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Default draw method that provides how the object should be drawn in the GUI. This method does not draw anything. Subclass should override this method based on how their object should appear.
        Parameters:
        g2d - The Graphics context used for drawing the object. Remember graphics contexts that we used in OCaml, it gives the context in which the object should be drawn (a canvas, a frame, etc.)
